adrFormatAddress: 287 Park Ave S 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Started out as a good business deal that ended in a lot of unknown expenses that were not mentioned upfront. The editing process was overwhelming and my final product was not good. Of course, I’m to blame. I needed more as a first-timer.  will NEVER use their service again because in the end they leave you alone. I was promised a hard copy of my book and have not received it to this day. They offered to have my book published on Amazon stating they would get 30%. Amazon is getting 90% and my royalty is only 10%. There must be a better way because I feel robbed by both.

Amazon is getting 90% and my royalty is only 10%. There must be a better way because I feel robbed by both.

originalText.text:
Communication is TERRIBLE, I have been waiting for my 10 complimentary copies for months( still have NOT RECEIVED THEM) My book was selling on Amazon and I wasn’t aware of it until almost a month later. I would call, no response, email, no response, text, no reply. I paid in full and on time for a service so I expected the same in return but NO!
I will pray for whoever is in charge here and never use their services again.

originalText.text: The team of editors, designers and marketers were professional, knowledgeable and provided excellent support throughout the entire process. They helped me to refine and improve my manuscript, designed a beautiful cover, and created a strong marketing strategy that helped to get my book noticed. I am glad that I took Acebookwriters into consideration for publishing my book.
